Alert.Description: CPDLC message timeout alert - no response received within timeout threshold

TriggerConditions.Condition: Track has CPDLC connection with logon status CONNECTED and data authority CURRENT
CPDLC uplink message type is CLEARANCE or INSTRUCTION with status SENT
Elapsed time since message transmission exceeds CPDLC_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT threshold
No CPDLC downlink response received (WILCO, UNABLE, STANDBY, or ROGER)
Message criticality level is HIGH or SAFETY_CRITICAL
Voice backup enabled and voice communication capability active

Action.name: VOICE_REVERSION
Action.description: Trigger voice communication reversion to controller

Action.name: VISUAL_ALERT
Action.description: Display visual alert on controller workstation

Action.name: AUDIO_ALERT
Action.description: Generate audio alert for controller attention

Action.name: LOG_EVENT
Action.description: Log timeout event in system audit trail

ClearanceConditions.Condition: CPDLC downlink response received (any type: WILCO, UNABLE, STANDBY, ROGER)
Message status changed to ACKNOWLEDGED or CANCELLED
CPDLC system status changed to non-OPERATIONAL
Track CPDLC connection status changed to DISCONNECTED

Alert.Description: CPDLC connection lost unexpectedly during active data link session
CPDLC logon attempt failed - connection could not be established
Voice communication reversion activated due to CPDLC timeout or failure
